title: Face of South Africa
creator_credit: Raymond Hancock, Errol Hinds, Malcolm Lomberg and South African Screen Productions
brief_description: By imaginative use of photographs, shows many facets of the peoples of South Africa. In youth, adolescence and age; at leisure and work; in joy, sorrow and excitement. Photography by Raymond Hancock with commentary and narration by Frank Secker.
creator_credit_for_label: Raymond Hancock, Errol Hinds, Malcolm Lomberg and South African Screen Productions
